name: Transfer (404 Team not found)
description:
This game is weird as hell. Was fun to make though, nah it was stressful...

to win you basically need to move all the slaves from 1 box to another box. You can do this in multiple ways as there are multiple mechanics and control in the game! Go ahead and check the "How to play" section in the game! There are multiple types of slaves with different AI and behaviours, so do observe them. (I'm terrible at making AI's).

There are 3 levels in total with level 3 being the hardest and buggiest one.

Use WASD and the mouse scroll to control the camera

press "C" to spawn coins, "SpaceBar" to spawn apples.

you can click and drag some objects to move them somewhere.

Esc key to pause the game

Grant Genesius Gunawan -  EVERYTHING 

Gerrion , Wilbert, Fabio - feedbacks, positive mental attitude 

my lil' sister also gave feedbacks and support, she demanded that i write that here.
